description: This file is a C header file declaring the interface for the Slap Loam Client Object in the Service Logic Aggregation Plane (SLAP). It contains function prototypes for creation, removal, enrollment, and initialization of the Loam Client Object, but no implementations or class definitions.

methods.name: SlapCreateLoamClient
methods.description: Creates a new Loam Client instance with provided context handles.

methods.name: SlapLcoCreate
methods.description: Creates a new SLAP Loam Client Object.

methods.name: SlapLcoRemove
methods.description: Removes the specified SLAP Loam Client Object.

methods.name: SlapLcoEnrollObjects
methods.description: Enrolls necessary objects into the SLAP Loam Client.

methods.name: SlapLcoInitialize
methods.description: Initializes the SLAP Loam Client Object.
